teaching.intro: I am passionate about education and committed to fostering the next generation of researchers and professionals in mathematics and computational sciences.
teaching.philosophy: My teaching philosophy centers on making complex mathematical concepts accessible through interactive learning, real-world applications, and collaborative problem-solving. I believe in nurturing critical thinking skills while building strong foundational knowledge.

courses.title: Advanced Topology and Applications
courses.description: An in-depth exploration of topological concepts with applications to data analysis, biology, and physics. Students will learn persistent homology, topological data analysis, and computational methods.

courses.title: Mathematical Modeling in Biology
courses.description: Introduction to mathematical techniques for modeling biological systems, including differential equations, network theory, and statistical analysis.

courses.title: Computational Methods for Scientists
courses.description: Practical programming and computational techniques for scientific research, covering Python, data analysis, machine learning, and high-performance computing.

courses.title: Research Seminar in Applied Mathematics
courses.description: Weekly seminar where students present current research, discuss recent papers, and develop presentation skills. Focus on interdisciplinary applications of mathematics.

courses.title: Introduction to Knot Theory
courses.description: Fundamentals of knot theory with applications to polymer science.

courses.title: Data Analysis for Biologists
courses.description: Statistical methods and computational tools for biological data analysis.

courses.title: Advanced Machine Learning for Scientists
courses.description: Deep learning, neural networks, and AI applications in scientific research. Covers TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern ML architectures.

courses.title: Applied Biostatistics
courses.description: Statistical methods for biological and medical research, including clinical trials, survival analysis, and meta-analysis.

courses.title: Topology in Data Science
courses.description: Advanced course on topological data analysis applications in machine learning, computer vision, and big data analytics.

courses.title: Computational Geometry and Algorithms
courses.description: Geometric algorithms, computational topology, and applications in computer graphics and robotics.
